scripts.start: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run electron"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client" "npm run electron"
scripts.electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node scripts/run_electron.js
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install
